contact.title: Let's work together!

project1.title: travel Agency Website
project1.description: A modern and responsive travel agency website built with React and Tailwind CSS. It features a clean UI, smooth navigation, and well-structured sections showcasing destinations, services, and travel inspiration.

project2.title: Hania Medical Website
project2.description: A responsive website for medical services and consultations built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project focuses on clear information presentation, accessibility, and a user-friendly layout for patients seeking healthcare services.

project3.title: My Portfolio
project3.description: A personal developer portfolio showcasing my projects, experience, and skills. Built with performance and accessibility in mind, featuring smooth navigation, responsive layouts, and modern UI design.

educard1.title: Freelance Frontend Developer
educard1.description: Working as a freelance frontend developer, building modern and responsive web applications for clients using React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript. Focused on clean UI, performance, and scalability.

educard2.title: Web Development Internship
educard2.description: Completed a one-month internship in web development, where I built a full website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Gained hands-on experience in real-world project structure and responsive design.
